# Start API - Autogenerated endpoints

## [Class-based Views]
[Don't repeat yourself]
[customers/api.py](../battlefield/gsm_provider/customers/api.py)

### Exercise:

#### Prepare `APIView` classes
Prepare class views:
* `class CustomerList(APIView):`
* `class CustomerDetail(APIView):`

Hint:
* Just replace if blocks with `get`, `post` etc functions.
* Remember about url dispatcher change: `CustomerList.as_view()`
